attributes.action: Abolish council fee to place a skip on any public road.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolish the £12 fee which goes to the local council, for a permit you must have if you hire a skip and it needs to placed anywhere other than your drive or property. Why does this fee have to be payed if we currently pay extortionate council tax rates? It costs £60 a ton to remove waste, so why the £12 fee? Please sign up if you agree
